page.title: 11The Sealand Festival
page.content: I went to Sealand Festival last year and I was on the white elephant stall with one of my friends,there were cake stalls,plant stalls,there was a stall where you had to pick a ticket and if it had a nought on the end you would have won something.There were book stalls.There were games like roll a penny,treasure hunt,throwing wet sponges in each other's faces,throwing the welly.There were boys playing football at the far end of the field and there was an obstacle race.There were different competitions,there was the best dressed bike organised by Sealand P.T.A..There was a fancy dress organised by St.Andrew's Church,the glamorous granny competition organised by one of the churches in Garden City, the knobbly knees competion organised by the youth club and there was bingo.
